Title: Times are great for programmers now. How does it end?
Description:
It is a good time to be in tech right now: soaring salaries, daily LinkedIn recruiter spam, people bootcamping their way into career switches to tech, remote work allowing you to work for a major tech company making triple digit salaries from the beach. It really feels like every single company is trying to recruit programmers nowadays, and doing whatever they can to get them.
I‚Äôm certainly happy with the current state of affairs, but I can‚Äôt help but wonder: How does it end?

Title: Simple Passwordless User Authorization
Description:
Passwordless User Authorization I hate passwords. Not as a user as password management is basically solved with most modern browsers and password managers. What I hate is having to deal with them as a developer. Hashing, storing, authentication, etc.
I did a small project recently using my socket.io synced vuex state and needed a system where users could easily login. I will put a huge disclaimer on this that this is just what I did for my personal project where security isn‚Äôt critical.
